data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Epack Prefab Technologies Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 01 2025 the equity shares of Epack Prefab Technologies Ltd (Scrip Code: 544540) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250930- dated September 30 2025.
